column4: I'm having some grub issues, anyone up for helping me troubleshoot?

help troubleshooting grub is about as much as I can ask without pouring out details. I dual-boot xp, was doing some repartitioning and stupidly let PartitionMagic Pro have free reign. It screwed up my MBR something fierce, used fixmbr on a windows boot disk, but now I'm having a lot of trouble getting grub running again (system will boot into windows fine)
